bibl.title: Ptolemaic Papyri in the Collection of the Erasmus University.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. II, 26 Petition to the epistates. Mid 2nd cent. - 2. II, 10. Complaint to the strategus. 167-166. - 3. II, 24. Complaint to an unknown official. Mid 2nd cent. - 4. II, 15. Permission to harvest. Idem. - 5. II, 16. Order for payment. Idem. - 6. II, 11. Survey of wine. 149-148. - 1-2: Oxyrhyncha; - 3-6 Arsinoites [P. Erasm. Inv. II, 10 = P. Erasm. I, 3; Inv. II, 11 = I, 19; Inv. II, 15 = I, 7; Inv. II, 16 = I, 10; Inv. II, 24 = I, 5; Inv. II, 26 = I, 4].
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, Ptolemaic Papyri in the Collection of the Erasmus University.

1. Inv. II, 26 Petition to the epistates. Mid 2nd cent. - 2. II, 10. Complaint to the strategus. 167-166. - 3. II, 24. Complaint to an unknown official. Mid 2nd cent. - 4. II, 15. II, 11 = I, 19; Inv. II, 15 = I, 7; Inv. II, 16 = I, 10; Inv. II, 24 = I, 5; Inv. II, 26 = I, 4].
